name: Plex Web App Blue / Grey Skin
description:
Plex themes and skins
Blue/Gray Skin for Plex Web App
Originally this modification was a few tweaks to the layout, but I decided to change the color scheme to the one I use on the Plex Forum.
additional_info:
Quick and dirty color scheme modification plus some small size changes to the layout for the plex web manager interface. If serveripaddress:32400/web is also used, that would need to be added after initial install or updating.

11/04/2015-Fixed a few inconsistencies.
Apr 29, 2016 - Updated to reflect changes in new web app
12/16/2016 - Updated to reflect changes in web app
